name: palm oil refinery operation | palm oil, refined | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/6418/documentation

This dataset models palm oil refining based on data for soybean oil refining.

From reception of crude palm oil at the refinery gate through refining of crude palm oil.  

System boundary is set by the boundaries of the refinery.
category: C:Manufacturing/10:Manufacture of food products/104:Manufacture of vegetable and animal oils and fats/1040:Manufacture of vegetable and animal oils and fats

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Average technology for alkaline refining process, which refers to caustic soda being added to degummed crude oil, which reacts with the free fatty acids (FFA) to form soap stock.  The oil/soap mixture is separated using a centrifuge, and filtration is performed to further clarify the oil from the soap.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Based on soybean oil refinery operation.

flow.name: palm oil, refined
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/10:Manufacture of food products/104:Manufacture of vegetable and animal oils and fats/1040:Manufacture of vegetable and animal oils and fats

exchanges.description: The utilization rate of 90% means that out of the whole capacity of the vegetable oil refinery only 90% is actually used for the production.
